q12-1-molecular-fraction.title: Molecular Volume Fraction (Q12.1)
q12-1-molecular-fraction.description: Molecules occupy ~0.04% of gas volume at STP.

q12-5-bubble-rise.title: Bubble Expansion (Q12.5)
q12-5-bubble-rise.description: P₁V₁/T₁ = P₂V₂/T₂. Bubble grows as it rises.

q12-8-rms-comparison.title: RMS Speed: v_rms ∝ 1/√M (Q12.8)
q12-8-rms-comparison.description: Same P,V,T → same n. Lighter molecules have higher v_rms.
